name: Tecuziztecatl
speed: walk 30 ft., climb 30 ft., swim 30 ft.

trait.name: Amphibious
text: Tecuziztecatl can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Glowing
text: Tecuziztecatl sheds dim light within 20 feet of itself.

trait.name: Flexible
text: Tecuziztecatl can enter a space large enough for a Medium creature without squeezing.

trait.name: Spider Climb
text: Tecuziztecatl can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Pseudopod
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spit Acid (Recharge 4-6)
text: Tecuziztecatl exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description:
A giant slug named Tecuziztecatl, the Lord of Snails. Tecuziztecatl (TayCOO-zeez-tay-COT-el) is highly intelligent and quite the boaster. In ancient lore it was considered to be related to the moon, a fact of which it is quite proud. During combat the slug will detail, in Olman, what it has in store for the characters and how hopeless their situation is.
Source: Tales from the Yawning Portal p. 245
